review: Wish I had done some research before I picked this up at a local store.  There are massive limitations and it forces you to use the Chrome browser from your laptop in order to use this.  I do not like Chrome and prefer Firefox (for now).The product specifications are, as such, not truthful.  The packaging does not specify that you need to use the Chrome browser.  It only states that it supports Windows.  If it supports windows, then why do I need to install Chrome?  A truthful spec would say it supports Chrome browsers on these platforms (e.g. Windows, iOS).  Went looking for a way to submit this review direct to Google, but somehow they seem to not have a product feedback page.I feel I've been mislead and will not purchase another piece of Google hardware without first deeply researching this.  All the other limitations of this product make it unusable for me which is a shame.
author: S. White
